technologyImpact.description:
Combining algorithms and patented technology,
we define colors as data, not perception.

card3.title: Faster Workflow

item2.title: Deep Learning Precision
item2.description: Trained with OpenCV and deep learning libraries, T-GRID defines shades through data, not perception.

item3.title: Proven with Patents & Research
item3.description:
Validated by domestic and international patents and publications.
Includes shade calibration, measurement devices, and more.

patent1.title: Patent 1
patent1.subTitle: Tooth Shade Calibration & Assessment
patent1.description: Method for calibrating and assessing tooth shade using reference teeth in clinical images.

patent2.title: Patent 2
patent2.subTitle: Object Color Measurement
patent2.description: Method and apparatus for measuring object color.

patent3.title: Patent 3
patent3.subTitle: Tooth Shade Correction Device
patent3.description: System and device for providing tooth shade correction service.

item4.title: Visualizing Color Data
item4.description: Captured tooth shades are visualized as colormaps, creating an inventory for data-driven dentistry and research.
